query:
SELECT 
  s.id, 
  s.name, 
  s.pricingType,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingTiers WHERE serviceId = s.id) as bedroom_tiers,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingSqm WHERE serviceId = s.id) as sqm_pricing,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingItems WHERE serviceId = s.id) as items
FROM services s
WHERE s.id IN (9, 10, 11, 12, 13)
ORDER BY s.id;

SELECT

  s.name, 
  s.pricingType,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingTiers WHERE serviceId = s.id) as bedroom_tiers,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingSqm WHERE serviceId = s.id) as sqm_pricing,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingItems WHERE serviceId = s.id) as items
FROM services s
WHERE s.id IN (9, 10, 11, 12, 13)
ORDER BY s.id;
